page.title: 07THRESHFIELD COMMUNITY GROUPS
page.content:
Some of the{Community Groups}in the area include,{The Youth Club, Brownies and the{Playgroup. The Youth Club meets at{Upper Wharfedale Secondary {School}and serves as a meeting place for children over thirteen. Various Games and Sports are practised there. Also children are encouraged to talk about their problems and other social concerns. The Club also liases with similar organisations in other areas.
{Playgroup}is attended by children over three and under five and is held on four mornings and one afternoon each week.Because of the large number of children in the area of that age no child is allowed to attend more than twice each week. Stories are read and songs sung each session,as well as just play.
